alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Floyd; Harrison; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:56PM EDT until July 02 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harrison County in south central Indiana... Central Crawford County in south central Indiana... Northeastern Perry County in south central Indiana... Southwestern Floyd County in south central Indiana... Northwestern Meade County in central Kentucky... * Until 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/. * At 455 PM EDT/355 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Carefree Town, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Corydon, Carefree Town, Milltown, Lanesville, Leavenworth, Elizabeth, Crandall, New Middletown, Alton and New Amsterdam. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
